_header: My dear son understand this book

CULKk15.First Lines:
[m]y dere sone wnderstande this bukþow study & reid It oft
                    and luk…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…And gyf hyme grace sa here to doThe blys of hevyne that he
                    cum to
